thread.title: Bernie Sanders to oppose Obama’s nominee to lead the FDA
thread.title_full: Bernie Sanders to oppose Obama’s nominee to lead the FDA - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Bernie Sanders to oppose Obama’s nominee to lead the FDA
text: Sen. Bernie Sanders (I-Vt.) plans to announce his opposition Friday to President Obama’s nominee to lead the Food and Drug Administration, citing questions about Dr. Robert M. Califf’s commitment to lowering pharmaceutical prices. Sanders, who is mounting a surprisingly strong bid for the Democratic presidential nomination against Hillary Rodham Clinton, told The Washington Post that […] ...
